explains: n. 详尽阐述，细化；精心完成的东西，苦心经营的成果

sentences.en: The importance of the plan needs no further elaboration.
sentences.cn: 这个计划的重要性无须赘述。

sentences.en: After the homework has been discussed, the teacher explains the topic of the lesson, slowly and with a lot of repetition and elaboration.
sentences.cn: "讨论完作业之后，教师会缓慢地、反复精细地讲解这节课的主题。

sentences.en: The development of an understanding of the self becomes evident between the first and second years of life and shows rapid elaboration in subsequent years.
sentences.cn: 对自我理解的发展在生命的头一两年间变得明显，在随后的几年里快速地变得详尽。
